column1: Regular traffic reports will resume Monday November 23 at 4:00 p.m.

column4: I-64E at 104 MM in Clark Co:
column5: One lane is blocked until further notice due to a serious collision.

column3: I-75/I-71 at Brent Spence Bridge (Cincinnati Area):
column4: The bridge is closed until further notice due to fire damage from a previous collision.
